items.summary: Update the public “Track Your Shipment” section behavior to match the user-provided HTML/JS: normalize the entered Tracking ID to uppercase before lookup; when a matching shipment exists, display the stored status string exactly as-is (do not prefix it with "Status: "); when no match exists, display exactly: "❌ Invalid Tracking ID. Please Contact DFC Office."

Seed localStorage shipments with the exact example Tracking IDs and statuses provided by the user when shipments storage is empty (first run / no shipments yet), without overwriting any existing shipments data.
Add a password protection gate for the Admin Tracking Panel so that shipment add/update/delete controls and the shipments table are hidden until the correct admin password is entered.
Update the Admin Tracking Panel shipment status input to support saving the full, custom status text (including emojis and additional details), rather than being limited to a fixed dropdown list.
